title: Mean higher than median in any distribution that

content.question: Dr. Bijou developed a test that measured the extent to which people have fixed mindsets about intelligence. In her data set, the mean is higher than the median. Which of the following describes the type of distribution her data set would display?

choices.label: The distribution would be positively skewed.
The distribution would represent measures for a random sample.

content.answer: The distribution would be positively skewed.

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
